com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.swt.eclipse

Class AcrolinxEclipsePlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.swt.eclipse.AcrolinxEclipsePlugin

  • public class AcrolinxEclipsePlugin
extends Object
    The class AcrolinxEclipsePlugin is used to handle the creation of an Eclipse-specific GuiCheckController. You should call startAcrolinxPlugin(AcrolinxEclipsePluginInitializer) at AbstractUIPlugin.start(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext) and stopAcrolinxPlugin() at AbstractUIPlugin.stop(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext). The easiest way to do this is using AbstractActivator.

      void startAcrolinxPlugin(AcrolinxEclipsePluginInitializer provider)
      startAcrolinxPlugin sets GuiCheckControllerProvider to a new instance of GuiCheckController .
      void stopAcrolinxPlugin()
      stopAcrolinxPlugin sets GuiCheckControllerProvider instance to null and calls GuiFactory.shutdown() to release all server connections.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AcrolinxEclipsePlugin

        public AcrolinxEclipsePlugin()

    • Method Detail

      • startAcrolinxPlugin

        public void startAcrolinxPlugin(AcrolinxEclipsePluginInitializer provider)
        startAcrolinxPlugin sets GuiCheckControllerProvider to a new instance of GuiCheckController . Should be called at AbstractUIPlugin.start(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext).

      • stopAcrolinxPlugin

        public void stopAcrolinxPlugin()
        stopAcrolinxPlugin sets GuiCheckControllerProvider instance to null and calls GuiFactory.shutdown() to release all server connections. Should be called at AbstractUIPlugin.stop(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext)

      • createGuiCheckController

        protected GuiCheckController createGuiCheckController(AcrolinxEclipsePluginInitializer provider,
                                          GuiFactory guiFactory,
                                          GuiEclipseFactory guiEclipseFactory,
                                          GuiSwtFactory guiSwtFactory)
        Creates the GUI check controller.
        Parameters:
        preferenceStore - the preference store provided by AbstractUIPlugin.getPreferenceStore()
        guiFactory - the GUI factory provided by AbstractActivator#getGuiFactory()
        guiEclipseFactory - the GUI Eclipse factory provided by AbstractActivator#getGuiEclipseFactory()
        Returns:
        a new instance of GuiCheckController

      • createApplicationSotre

        protected ApplicationStore createApplicationSotre(org.eclipse.jface.preference.IPreferenceStore preferenceStore,
                                      GuiEclipseFactory guiEclipseFactory,
                                      GuiFactory guiFactory)
        Creates the ApplicationStore. By default a EclipseAuthTokenStore is used. Override this method for different behavior. For example: If you want to use a file-based store use AbstractActivator#getGuiFactory()
        Parameters:
        preferenceStore - the preference store provided by AbstractUIPlugin.getPreferenceStore()
        guiEclipseFactory - the GUI Eclipse factory provided by AbstractActivator#getGuiEclipseFactory
        guiFactory -
